mapper.select: select application_type from application_type_ group by application_type

select
from application_type_ where application_type = #{applicationType} and application_children_type = #{applicationChildrenType}
mapper.insert: insert into application_type_ (application_type, application_children_type, description) values (#{applicationType}, #{applicationChildrenType}, #{description})

insert into application_type_
application_type,
application_children_type,
description,
#{applicationType},
#{applicationChildrenType},
#{description},
